content:
<rule id="technology-usage-logging-00060" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <graph-query discriminator="TechnologyTagModel">
                    <property name="name">Logging to file system</property>
                </graph-query>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <technology-identified name="File system logging">
                    <tag name="Sustain"/>
                    <tag name="Java EE"/>
                    <tag name="Logging"/>
                </technology-identified>
            </perform>
        </rule>
